subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Boston Bruins defenseman Matt Hunwick was taken to a hospital to be checked for a spleen injury. Bruins Coach Claude Julien said Hunwick was not feeling well after a team meeting Saturday, ahead of Game 2 of the Eastern Conference playoff series against Montreal. Hunwick was involved in a fight in Game 1 with Montreal’s Mike Komisarek.
